nodes.text: http://www.guncite.com/gun_control_gcdgcon.html What is so doubtful about it? It makes sense to me.

So the stats come from John Lott.... Wasn't he the one who got caught making up statistics and impersonated a woman for three years to support the pro-gun cause? http://articles.latimes.com/2006/may/31/opinion/oe-wiener31 http://whoismaryrosh.com/ ....a bizarre individual who I don't think can be trusted.
So the stats come from John Lott.... Wasn't he the one who got caught making up statistics and impersonated a woman for three years to support the pro-gun cause?
And the Violence Policy Center is somehow more trustworthy?
I would like him to provide evidence in support of his repeated claim that posters here have frequently said 'that honest citizens will commit crimes if given guns.'
